info.name: Doctor Edit Profile API
info.description: API collection for Doctor Edit Profile operations

request.description: Get doctor edit profile data (display_name, bio, clinic_name, clinic_address, profile_image)

body.raw:
{
    "doctor_id": 1,
    "display_name": "Dr. Arun Kumar",
    "bio": "Experienced General Medicine practitioner with 10+ years of clinical experience. Specialized in preventive care and chronic disease management.",
    "clinic_name": "VaidyaCare Medical Center",
    "clinic_address": "123 Medical Plaza, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400001"
}

request.description: Update doctor edit profile (display_name, bio, clinic_name, clinic_address)
